## Notes

* '''''BENEFIT:''''' +2 [Penetration](/penetration/) against damaged target from your Estoc. Piercing damage is most resisted with opponents, but this will do the most damage if vulnerable. However, opponents will generally favor you most, even with a tanky type present.
* '''''PENALTY:''''' -15 [Deflection](/deflection/) for 10 seconds after you make an Estoc attack. This unfortunately seems to stack with itself.
